Object.Field:
create table SNP_EXP_TXT (
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_CHANGE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
INT_VERSION NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_TXT NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
TXT VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
TXT_ORD NUMBER(10) NOT NULL
)

create table SNP_EXP_TXT_HEADER (
I_TXT NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
FULL_TXT CLOB NULL
)

create table SNP_FF_VALUEE (
FF_CODE VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
I_INSTANCE NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_OBJECTS NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
NUM_VALUE NUMBER(10) NULL ,
SHORT_TXT_VALUE VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_ID (
ID_SEQ NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
ID_TBL VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
ID_NEXT NUMBER(19) NULL
)

create table SNP_IMPORT_REP (
REP_SHORT_ID NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
REP_TIMESTAMP VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL
)

create table SNP_LOAD_PLAN (
I_LOAD_PLAN NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
LOAD_PLAN_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
I_SCEN_FOLDER NUMBER(10) NULL ,
KEEP_LOG_HDAYS NUMBER(10) NULL ,
IND_SESS_LOG VARCHAR2(2 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_STEP_LOG VARCHAR2(2 CHAR) NULL ,
TASK_LOG_LEVEL NUMBER(1) NULL ,
SESS_KEYWORDS VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
I_TXT_DESC NUMBER(19) NULL ,
INT_VERSION NUMBER(10) NULL ,
IND_CHANGE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
EXT_VERSION VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_LOCK (
LOCK_ID VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
LOCK_NAME VARCHAR2(50 CHAR) NOT NULL
)

create table SNP_LOCKED_OBJECT (
I_INSTANCE NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_OBJECT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
LOCK_START_DATE DATE NULL ,
USER_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_LOC_REPW (
REP_SHORT_ID NUMBER(3) NOT NULL ,
REP_TIMESTAMP VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
REP_NAME VARCHAR2(128 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
REP_PASSW VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
REP_TYPE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
REP_VERSION VARCHAR2(15 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
IND_INSTALL_OK VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
MIN_EXE_VERSION VARCHAR2(15 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
VERSION_TIMESTAMP VARCHAR2(30 CHAR) NULL ,
FIRST_DATE DATE NULL ,
FIRST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
LAST_DATE DATE NULL ,
LAST_USER VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_LPI_EC_VAR_LOG (
I_LP_INST NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
I_LP_STEP NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
NB_RUN NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_LP_STEP_EXCEPT NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
VAR_NAME VARCHAR2(436 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
START_DATE DATE NOT NULL ,
END_DATE DATE NULL ,
DURATION NUMBER(10, 2) NULL ,
STATUS VARCHAR2(2 CHAR) NULL ,
RETURN_CODE VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
I_TXT_MESS NUMBER(19) NULL ,
VAR_VALUE VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
I_TXT_VAR_VALUE NUMBER(19) NULL ,
ERROR_MESSAGE CLOB NULL ,
VAR_LONG_VALUE CLOB NULL ,
REFRESH_SQL CLOB NULL
)

I_LP_INST NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,

NB_RUN NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,

I_TXT_MESS NUMBER(19) NULL ,

NB_ROW NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_INS NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_UPD NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_DEL NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_ERR NUMBER(10) NULL ,

)

create table SNP_LPI_RUN (
I_LP_INST NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
NB_RUN NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
START_DATE DATE NOT NULL ,
END_DATE DATE NULL ,
DURATION NUMBER(10, 2) NULL ,

)

create table SNP_LPI_STEP (
I_LP_INST NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,

)

create table SNP_PLAN_AGENT (
I_PLAN_AGENT NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
SCEN_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
SCEN_VERSION VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
LAGENT_NAME VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,

S_DAY VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NULL ,

S_WEEK_DAY VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NULL ,

S_MINUTE VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NULL ,
S_SECOND VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NULL ,
R_TIME NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
R_DUR_INTERVAL NUMBER(10) NULL ,

LOG_LEVEL NUMBER(4) NULL ,

S_END_DATE DATE NULL ,
S_TYPE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
USER_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
S_BEGIN_HOUR DATE NULL ,
R_TIME_ERROR_INT NUMBER(10) NULL ,
S_END_HOUR DATE NULL ,
S_EX_DAYS_MONTH VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NULL ,
S_EX_DAYS_WEEK VARCHAR2(7 CHAR) NULL ,
S_WEEK_DAY_RANK VARCHAR2(100 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_JOB_TYPE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_SCEN (
SCEN_NO NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
SCEN_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NOT NULL ,

)

)

)

)

)

COL_IND_ENC VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
COL_ENC_KEY VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_TXT CLOB NULL ,
DEF_IND_ENC VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_ENC_KEY VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
ERROR_MESSAGE CLOB NULL ,
IND_LOG_FINAL_CMD VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_SESS_TASK_LOG (
SESS_NO NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
NNO NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
NB_RUN NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
SCEN_TASK_NO NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
TASK_BEG DATE NULL ,
TASK_END DATE NULL ,
TASK_DUR NUMBER(10) NULL ,
TASK_STATUS VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
TASK_RC VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
TASK_MESS VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
NB_ROW NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_INS NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_UPD NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_DEL NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_ERR NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_TXT_TASK_MESS NUMBER(19) NULL ,
COL_TXT CLOB NULL ,
COL_IND_ENC VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
COL_ENC_KEY VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_TXT CLOB NULL ,
DEF_IND_ENC VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
DEF_ENC_KEY VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
TASK_NAME3 VARCHAR2(436 CHAR) NULL ,
IND_VALUE_TRACK VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
ERROR_MESSAGE CLOB NULL ,
IND_LOG_FINAL_CMD VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL
)

create table SNP_SESS_TASK_LS (

)

create table SNP_SESS_TXT_LOG (
SESS_NO NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
NNO NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,

TXT_ORD NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,

ENC VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,

)

create table SNP_STEP_LOG (
SESS_NO NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
NNO NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
NB_RUN NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_STEP NUMBER(10) NULL ,
STEP_BEG DATE NULL ,
STEP_END DATE NULL ,
STEP_DUR NUMBER(10, 2) NULL ,
STEP_STATUS VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
STEP_RC VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
STEP_MESS VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
NB_ROW NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_INS NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_UPD NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_DEL NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_ERR NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_TXT_STEP_MESS NUMBER(19) NULL ,
ERROR_MESSAGE CLOB NULL ,
IND_VALUE_TRACK VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
EXECUTION_ORDER NUMBER(10) NULL
)

create table SNP_STEP_REPORT (
SCEN_NO NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
SCEN_RUN_NO NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
NNO NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
NB_RUN NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
I_STEP NUMBER(10) NULL ,
STEP_NAME VARCHAR2(436 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
STEP_BEG DATE NULL ,
STEP_END DATE NULL ,
STEP_DUR NUMBER(10, 2) NULL ,
STEP_STATUS VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NULL ,
STEP_RC VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
STEP_MESS VARCHAR2(250 CHAR) NULL ,
NB_ROW NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_INS NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_UPD NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_DEL NUMBER(10) NULL ,
NB_ERR NUMBER(10) NULL ,
I_TXT_STEP_MESS NUMBER(19) NULL ,
LSCHEMA_NAME VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
MOD_CODE VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
TABLE_NAME VARCHAR2(128 CHAR) NULL ,
RES_NAME VARCHAR2(400 CHAR) NULL ,
F_CONTEXT_CODE VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
CONTEXT_CODE VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NULL ,
ERROR_MESSAGE CLOB NULL ,
EXECUTION_ORDER NUMBER(10) NULL
)

create table SNP_TASK_TXT (
SESS_NO NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,
NNO NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
SCEN_TASK_NO NUMBER(10) NOT NULL ,
ORD_TYPE VARCHAR2(1 CHAR) NOT NULL ,

)

create table SNP_VAR_DATA (
VAR_NAME VARCHAR2(436 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
CONTEXT_CODE VARCHAR2(35 CHAR) NOT NULL ,
I_VAL NUMBER(19) NOT NULL ,

)

create table SNP_VAR_SESS (

VAR_NAME VARCHAR2(436 CHAR) NOT NULL ,

)
